file_content.text: Let me bear my disgrace in silence.
Countless worlds... countless armies... to fall here?
We are an extension of the Emperor's power. He cannot be defeated. I cannot be defeated!
I'm still waiting for that surrender.
Time to stand down.
I've failed the Emperor. I will not shame him by surrendering.
Someone's delusional.
You could be dead and defeated.
Hey, could be worse.
You have no idea which is worse, do you?
I swore an oath of loyalty to the Emperor. To break it is unforgivable.
My mistakes cannot go unpunished. Kill me.
Forget the Emperor. You're the Republic's prisoner now.
I won't do this. [Spare him]
Serving the Emperor has been my life. Keeping me alive now would be torture.
Checking in, General. Looks like the Imperial Guard was cleared out. Commander Tainor survived the battle.
You had this coming. Your honor has nothing to do with it.
With pleasure. [Kill him]
I embrace it nonetheless.
Yes, sir, I'll relay the message--General Aves apologizes for our timing, but it looks like we weren't needed.
We'll secure the museum. The general requests that you meet him back at the command bunker ASAP.
You must be Commander Tainor.
And you're the reason half my Guardsmen aren't responding.
I've been waiting a long time for you to reach us. The Republic must be doing well.
The Republic has the Empire cornered.
Above and beyond well.
Yet most of the Imperial Guard remains here.
How did you know the Republic would send me?
I was expected?
You thought to conquer Corellia unnoticed?
You don't seem too concerned.
Something's fishy here.
Why should I be? The Empire's fate in Axial Park is in no way tied to mine. Or yours.
The Imperial Guard has no interest in Corellia or the Republic's claim. Our men in the field were sent to challenge you.
The Emperor is aware of your presence. Your interference can no longer be allowed.
Maybe the Emperor should take it as a warning.
He's right to worry.
He has. A warning that even a slave as powerful as you isn't worth the cost.
Killing me won't solve the Emperor's problems.
I'm only one of many.
The Children of the Emperor are his greatest weapon. You will not stand in their way.
I fight for the Republic, like any other soldier.
I'm doing my duty.
Dying for them should earn you a place in this museum. My men can find a suitable spot.
Glad to hear I've made an impression.
I'm flattered.
You've come farther than anyone expected. But I'm afraid your luck's run out.
The Emperor sent you here to kill me?
Say that again?
I imagine our next objective will be to retake Axial Park. But first things first.
You'll have to survive this fight first.
Your funeral. [Attack]
Follow your orders. Serve the Emperor. Destroy our target.
Those who challenge the Imperial Guard challenge the Emperor himself.
Status update, General. We're inside. The Imperial Guard's been wiped out. Commander Tainor is dead.
